content.query:
SELECT *
FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
)
WITH (
    date_key VARCHAR(8),
    date DATE,
    year SMALLINT,
    month SMALLINT,
    day SMALLINT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month SMALLINT,
    week_of_year SMALLINT,
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    year_month VARCHAR(6),
    year_week VARCHAR(6)
)
AS [RESULT]
